column4: actually, i see it, but once i click on my name, it logins in
You just need to find the setting in KDE for auto-login and turn it off.  Worst case scenario you need to edit gconf.  You should not have to remove KDE
Oh, if you see it than don't click you name click the session button at the bottom.
i dont see it UNless i press OTHER and then type my name
